loop_edges: Core Developer -> Implicit Knowledge Transfer (Mentorship) -> Promotion Rate -> Core Developer
description: This reinforcing loop accelerates team growth as more core developers provide mentorship, increasing the promotion rate and further expanding the core team.
citation_title: Socialization in Open Source Software Projects: A Growth Mixture Modeling Approach
citation_relevance: Examines how socialization processes including mentorship lead to core developer promotion and team growth in OSS projects

loop_edges: Core Developer -> Implicit Knowledge Transfer (Mentorship) -> Skill up -> Experienced Contributors -> Promotion Rate -> Core Developer
description: This virtuous cycle amplifies team capability as mentorship builds experienced contributors who get promoted, creating more mentors to continue the cycle.

loop_edges: Core Developer -> Developer's Turnover -> Core Developer
description: This balancing loop maintains team stability by limiting growth; as the core team grows, turnover increases, naturally regulating its size.
